data.name: TObOR
data.detailed_description:
Mission:

to Be Or Not to Be

To:

Xlcr (Well trained spy robot)

Executive Summary


Goralini Foundation's recent discovery and research is a potential threat to RA Corporation. Our top secret intelligence team have detected the hidden location of Goralini's research headquarters last week.

Your assignment is to enter the research facility undetected, to install our top of the line spy cameras, and to report back to HQ with intelligence.

Unfortunately, RA Corporation's most innovative CCTV technology is not yet complete, heavily missing the required hardware compatibility. Hence, Agent, we depend on you to utilize your robotic hardware. Connecting yourself to the distributed laptop will allow you to control the spy camera.

Oh, one more thing...the laptop was falsely distributed and is missing key components used to save data, so it is suggested that you save data on your internal hard drive. Since your hard drive has limited space, you must delete it as soon as it is sent to HQ to save space for the next report.

Good luck Agent. RA corporation's fate is in your hands. And, remember, if you get caught...we'll disavow all connections.

Mission Impossible


  • Install CCTV spy camera. (Complete)
Our world class secret intelligence team has found out that there are many inhabitants in the facility. You must install CCTV spy cams without getting caught.

  • Monitor the CCTV to gather intelligence.
Secrecy is our motto. We don't want to cause panic among the public. It is your obligation to examine everything that goes on in Goralini's facility.

  • Use the 'Scan' function to collect information.
RA Corporation's cutting-edge CCTV technology has many additional features to help you on your mission. Among our favorite, 'Scanning objects in the camera' can help you learn more about the subject. Utilize this feature to collect information and don't not forget to save it.

  • Eavesdrop on the inhabitants
In addition to 'Scan' feature, RA Corporation's CCTV technology also allows Agents to 'Eavesdrop' on the conversation and sound. Headphones are highly recommended to capture the little ones. Once again, do not forget to save the ones you find important.

  • Report to HQ
Agent, you are already programmed to report back to HQ. On midnight, an automatic sequence will begin to transmit all the saved data back to HQ. Your cache and hard drive will automatically do a factory reset routine. This is necessary to save space for the next report. All lost information won't be accessible, so keep that in mind.

You are prohibited from


  • Receiving calls from unknown caller id.
These type of calls are most likely a trap. It is important to stay undetected. Do not trust anyone.

  • Intervening to CCTV situations.
Refrain yourself from watching CCTVs like the movies or TV shows. Live footages are highly immersive, and as much as you want to intervene to help or to harass a subject, your assignment is to observe and gather intelligence. Secrecy is our motto. Intervening or the overuse of hacking can bring consequences.

Reward & Compensation:

1 Grade Job Promotion and Bonus

Warning

  • If the Agent does not fully comply to these terms, HQ can impose penalties or sanctions.
  • The Agent is responsible of all consequences that may occur due to violations of these terms.
  • The features available in the CCTV consumes large amounts of electricity. The Laptop may be forced to shut down, however this is not a malfunction.

data.short_description: It's dark. You wake up to the static sound of the TV. It's an old CCTV. You find yourself frowning at the atrocities happening inside, and you pick up the file folders and get to work.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4330 @ 3.5GHz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX570 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X or Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4670
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7850 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
